titles.title: NEWBORN Act
Nationally Enhancing the Well-being of Babies through Outreach and Research Now Act
NEWBORN Act

A bill to authorize funding for the creation and implementation of infant mortality pilot programs in standard metropolitan statistical areas with high rates of infant mortality, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
